name: Skyland (evanbowman)
description:
~~  SKYLAND ~~

A simple strategy game, where you build flying castles and fight other players. Runs on a Gameboy Advance.

Supported peripherals:

* Gameboy Player (Gamecube) rumble support

* Link cable multiplayer

* SRAM or Flash storage, but SRAM strongly recommended

Check the project README file for more info about the game: https://github.com/evanbowman/skyland#readme
